CURRICUL UMVITAE  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY  
Experienced CCTV Installer with knowledge of all sorts of security system installation needs. Extensive 
knowledge of multiple security systems .Has years of industry experience in installation of CCTV and 
maintenance of installed systems . 
 
WORK EXPERIENCE:  
5 Years  of Professional Experience  
CCTV Technician :  
Presently Working with Ivaid Surveillance  Pvt. Ltd. As a CCTV Technician  since  01th Aug’17 - 01 Jul ’2018  
 Work  with Mishu Solutions as a CCTV Technician/operator  since  01th Aug’14 - 01 Jul ’2017  
Duties & Responsibilities  
 Consulted with businesses and homeowners regarding CCTV security system needs.  
 Work in CCTV, VDP, and ADP.  ALARM SYSTEM, EPBAX.  
 Install and commission alarm systems, access control, IP CCTV and intercoms  
 Maintenance and troubleshooting of electronic security devices and  systems   
 Manage and maintain existing and new wireless and cabled networks for customers  
 Train and mentor new team members and apprentices  
 Install DTU, Routers, Switches, Node, and any other network equipments  
 To repair and solve any network fault in the customer  
 To ensure certain customers acceptance obtained in the service order update the supervisor and the 
POS system after the installation immediately.  
 To meet the customers before and after the Implementation if it’s needed and to make sure that the 
service is accepted by the customer.

 A working knowledge of using and installing software on servers and workstations  
 troubleshooting and resolving wireless and wired networks  
 MS Word: Excellent skills  in editing typing and maintaining documents .
